summary:
The Security Council,
 Reaffirming resolutions 864 (1993) and subsequent relevant resolutions, 
 Reaffirming commitment to preserve Angola's sovereignty and territorial integrity,
 Welcoming steps by Angola's Government and UNITA towards implementing the "Accordos de Paz", Lusaka Protocol, and relevant resolutions,
 Concerned about humanitarian effects on civilians,
 Acting under Chapter VII of the UN Charter,
1. Will consider the monitoring mechanism's additional report,
2. Decides measures imposed by resolutions 864 (1993), 1127 (1997), and 1173 (1998) cease to have effect,
3. Dissolves the Committee established by resolution 864 (1993) with immediate effect,
4. Requests the Secretary-General to close the UN Trust Fund, reimbursing contributors on a proportionate basis.
